Name: Court Change
Effect: Target Battlefield. Swap any Force Fields, Entry Hazards and Effects on the Foe's side of the field (ie Tailwind, Grassy Terrain healing, Fire Pledge.) for those on the User's side.
Description: The Pok√©mon signals the referee for half-time, the referee complies and both parties swap their sides of the field. Wait... we brought everything with us, right?
